product_name: Champagne Le Brun de Neuville Autolyse Noirs & Blancs Champagne Brut NV
product_description:
eta charset="utf-8">

Champagne Le Brun de Neuville Autolyse Noirs & Blancs Champagne Brut NV

At the end of the fermentation and during the ageing on lees in bottle, the yeast gradually die. The phenomenon of Autolyse takes place; some microorganism are released, they interact with the wine and provide power and complexity. Autolyse cuvees, from selected plots and raised for a decade on lees, celebrates Time and its imprint on the wine.

eta charset="utf-8">

Grape Varietals & Region: 100% Cabernet Sauvignon. The vines grow on thin, stony soil between 150 and 300 feet above sea level. Morning fog and strong afternoon breezes from San Pablo Bay moderate our vineyard’s climate. Sourced from old vines on the Hendry Ranch<br data-mce-fragment="1">

Grape Varietals & Region: 48% Cabernet Sauvignon, 13% of each Petit Verdot, Cabernet Franc, Malbec, and Merlot. The Hendry Vineyard is located on benchlands west of the town of Napa. The vines grow on thin, stony and clay soils, between 200 and 300 feet above sea level. Morning fog and strong afternoon breezes from San Pablo Bay moderate our climate. Our vineyard is the sole source for grapes for all of our wines. It has been home to the Hendry family since 1939.
The Cab Franc is done in selected vintages where the quality of the must is too good to be blended with the Cabernet Sauvignon for the Red Blend

Grape Varietals & Region: 100% Chardonnay from 40 year old vines planted in Mt. Veeder, slightly west of Napa. The elevation is between 200 and 220 feet above sea level. The soil is thin loam on a solid rock base. Morning fog and afternoon breezes from the San Pablo Bay moderate the climate, giving them long, warm summer days and cooler nights.

product_name: Peay Vineyards Cep Wines Pinot Noir 2021
product_description: The Cep label is a second label from Peay Vineyards, made solely from barrels of Peay Vineyards’ estate wines that through the blending process were not selected for the first label, or are from the Hopkins vineyard in the Russian River Valley.

product_name: Grounded Wine Co. Landform Pinot Noir Willamette Valley 2020
product_description: A Landform is a natural and exceptional feature of the solid surface of the Earth. In our world, Landform is a reaffirmation of our commitment to creating wines that evoke a sense of place.<br data-mce-fragment="1">

product_name: Domaine Altugnac Orange is the New Wine 2020
product_description: Childhood friends Christian Collovray and Jean-Luc Terrier each grew up in a family of winemakers and shared a bond from a young age. Following the success of Domaine des Deux Roches, in 1997 Christian and Jean-Luc branched out from Mâcon and purchased land in the southwest of the Languedoc in Limoux.

CERES comes from a plot of eight hectares cultivated with a method called agroecology and agroforestry. Haut Bages Liberal has been experimenting for some time with alternative, more sustainable practices for managing the vineyard. Claire Villars-Lurton, the owner, described it as organic and then one step further. This means that you plant trees – carefully selected varieties – in the vineyard and that you have a cover crop. The trees and cover crops promote and regenerate the microbiological life in the soil and, not least, bind carbon dioxide.
Grape Varietals & Region: 100% Pinot Noir, selected from more than 15-year-old vines located at an altitude of 1200m

Grape Varietals & Region: 100% Olaszrizling, also known in the Carpathian Basin as Italian Riesling or Weiss Riesling. The Badacsonyi Italian Riesling is the estate's entry-level Italian Riesling, in the name of which Badacsony does not denote the mountain, but the wine region.
Grape Varietals & Region: 100% Kadarka, from Nagy-Eged, in Eger, Hungary.
Grape Varietals & Region: 100% Riesling from Etyek-Buda, just outside Budapest, Hungary
Hendry Ranch Pinot Noir 2020

Primitivo's roots go back hundreds of years to Croatia, where it originated along with its more familiar genetic twin: Zinfandel. Zinfandel and Primitivo share common parentage. Essentially synonymous, Primitivo is now associated with Puglia, Italy, where it is commonly grown, and Zinfandel with California.

Grape Varietals & Region: 100% Zinfandel. Hendry Block 28 is located on bench lands west of the town of Napa. This 4.17-acre block is 160 feet above sea level and has thin, stony soils. Morning fog and strong afternoon breezes from San Pablo Bay moderate the maritime climate. The vines were planted in 1998 using St. George roots and grafted with budwood selected from an old-vine Zinfandel vineyard on Mt. Veeder called the Brandlin Ranch.

product_name: Guiseppe Campagnola Vigneti Foscarino Le Bine Soave Classico DOC 2021

Fujimaru Table Top Delaware is a unique orange wine made from Delaware grapes grown in the vineyards of Kashiwara, Osaka. The grapes are hand-selected and fermented with wild yeasts, resulting in a wine with a bright orange hue and a distinctive aroma of ripe oranges.

Our upcoming tasting on 26 August features Galicia! Although most known for it's Albarino, Galicia also produces some lesser known white varietals, and even reds!

product_name: Cantine Volpi Timorasso Colli Tortonesi "La Zerba" DOC 2021
product_description: Cantine Volpi Timorasso Colli Tortonesi "La Zerba" DOC is a captivating white wine that showcases the unique Timorasso grape and the rich terroir of the Colli Tortonesi region in Piedmont, Italy. With its enticing aromas, complex flavors, and impeccable craftsmanship, this wine offers an exceptional drinking experience.

product_name: Champagne Charles Heidsieck Blanc de Blanc NV
product_description: Charles Heidsieck was one of the very first Champagne Houses to demonstrate its passion for Chardonnay by producing a Blanc de Blancs in its 1949 vintage. There is also evidence that the Maison had produced some mono-crus from the Côte des Blancs as early as1906...  Through this cuvée, relaunched in 2018, two of the House’s areas of expertise come together: the production of great white wines and the art of blending a large selection of wines from different years and terroirs. The considerable challenge is to make opposites coexist: the tautness and the freshness of young chardonnays on the one hand, and the silky “Charles” character on the other.

product_name: Tenuta Il Poggione Brunello di Montalcino 2018
product_description: Brunello is the prince of Montalcino wines, produced exclusively from Sangiovese grapes picked by hand from the oldest vines in the farm.

product_name: Tenuta Il Poggione Rosso di Montalcino 2020
product_description: Younger, more accessible version of the Brunello, but already with an excellent structure and a great personality, Rosso di Montalcino is a very important wine for Tenuta Il Poggione.

product_description: Grape Varietals & Region: Vermentino & Chardonnay blend from various vineyards planted between 150 and 450 metres (490 - 1475 ft) above sea level.

The CHN 2021 label is a detail from an oil on linen painting by the gifted Sydney artist, Alesandro Ljubicic, called “Try To Be A Rainbow To Someone’s Cloud” @alesandroljubicic

product_name: Tamnavulin Red Wine Cask Edition Germany Pinot Noir Cask
product_description: Tamnavulin has dabbled with red wine cask finishes before, but this is something interesting from the Speyside distillery. It's gone and finished this single malt in casks which previously held German pinot noir!

product_name: Tamnavulin Red Wine Cask Edition Spanish Grenache Cask
product_description: Single malt Scotch from the Tamnavulin Red Wine Cask Edition range. Matured in American oak, it has then been finished in casks that previously held Spanish grenache, for some juicy red berry and mellow spice notes.

product_name: Tamnavulin Red Wine Cask Edition French Cabernet Sauvignon Cask
product_description: A fruity, floral Tamnavulin single malt that has been matured in Cabernet Sauvignon red wine casks, creating layers of orchard fruit, lime blossom, marmalade, cinnamon, poached pear and almond on the nose, complemented by notes of nectarines, damson plums, gingerbread, red berries and ripe bananas throughout the palate.

Kilchoman Sanaig is an enjoyably peaty single malt which has been vatted from both bourbon and Sherry casks. It's named after a small, rocky creek rather near the distillery on the west coast of the island. Look out for plenty of fruit and earthy peat coming through on this one, with a touch of dark chocolate-covered raisins.

product_name: Highland Park Full Volume Single Malt Scotch Whisky
product_description: A new release from Highland Park, which will be music to some people's ears. Dubbed Full Volume, the expression was distilled in 1999 and bottled in 2017. It spent this time exclusively in first fill bourbon casks, rather than Highland Park's traditional sherry casks. This certainly turned up the volume on those delicious creamy bourbon notes. The single malt was finally bottled at 47.2% ABV and comes presented in a sufficiently trendy presentation box which could easily be mistaken for a Highland Park-sized speaker.

A sextuple-wood bottling from Dalmore. This auspiciously-named single malt Scotch whisky was matured in wine, Madeira, Sherry, Marsala, Kentucky bourbon and Port casks. King Alexander III is a rich, fruity Highland single malt.

product_description: One of the two first releases of a double-matured product, 100% aged at the distillery. Distilled in 2010, this rum was aged first in once used, American White Oak Ex-Bourbon casks for 8 years, followed by Madeira casks for 2 years. This was followed by 2 years in an Ex-Madeira casks for added depth and complexity and bottled at 45% alc
Limited to 210 bottles

Trois Rivières Single Cask Millésime 2000

This 15-year-old rum has aged in a unique cask, a rare new oak cask from the Appalachians. Intense, elegant and complex, it presents notes of dried fruits, precious woods and spices. You can savor a long and fruity finish.

Born from sugar cane molasses in British Guyana, as a skilled blend of various vintages from pot stills (to give it full bodied richness) and column stills (for a lighter backbone of crisp drinkability).

Main aging is in ex-Bourbon American oak barrels for a creamy sweetness, then a 12 months period into fresh sherry butts (Pedro Ximenez and Oloroso) enhances its spicy character. A small percentage of very old Enmore rum is finally added to the blend for further complexity and “dark” character.

product_name: Ron Del Barrilito Superior Especial Rum Three Stars
product_description:
eta charset="utf-8">

Ron Del Barrilito Superior Especial Rum Three Stars

An impeccable blend of rums aged between 6 and 10 years in “Oloroso” white oak barrels. It’s a wonderful sipping rum best enjoyed neat. Maybe just a splash of water or on the rocks, but you already know that great spirits need little enhancement.

Ron Quorhum is a modern Premium Rums series, celebrated as innovative, but with roots in old Cuban production traditions. In this series of Rum you have used Rum distilled on a base of sugar rose juice and molasses. In addition, two types of oak trees have also been used during storage process, including American oak and French oak. One can in this way say that the Spanish Rum Tradition meets the French and has created a hybrid, but the unmatched fullness and complexity.

2>Plantation Rum XO 20th Anniversary

Plantation XO 20th Anniversary is created using a blend of quintessential extra-old rums from Barbados.

product_name: Ron Mulata 15 Years Gran Reserva Anejo Rum
product_description:
An ageless rum that has aged fifteen years in French oak barrels. Over time, this prolonged contact with the wood gave it its beautiful amber color.

Color: Its color is amber, with mahogany reflections.

Nose: Aromas of vanilla and coconut are clearly perceived. The aromatic profile of this 15-year-old displays great indulgence.

Palate: A voluptuous palate, which gives pride of place to woody notes. We also find the flavors of vanilla and coconut.

Finish: Its aromatic persistence is oriented towards a woody finish.

This is a blend of casks from two distilleries in Jamaica: Monymusk and Hampden. The latter distillery has Scottish roots, and is one of the oldest sugar plantations in the country. It has always been known as a rum distillery of high calibre, making spirit for blending.

product_name: La Maison du Rhum République Dominicaine Batch 2
product_description: Solera 12 - Aged in American oak barrels. Gourmet rum full of character, this new origin will delight lovers of aging in Solera.

product_name: Flor de Cana 15 Year Eco Rum
product_description: Flor de Cana 15 Year Eco Rum

A top quality rum from the Nicaraguan producer, Flor de Caña. This is fine sipping rum, with flavours like toffee apple and buttery vanilla. We love it. We also love the fact that the distillery is certified carbon neutral and fair trade, using 100% renewable energy and offsetting any emissions through planting trees – a whopping 50,000 of them a year since 2005!

Phoenix is a classic representation of the Hudson Estate. The wine was named after the 2017 wildfires swept through the estate, miraculously avoiding the original buildings from the 1980s.

Over thirty years of meticulous winegrowing and winemaking experience goes into each bottle of Hudson Wine. Additionally, Hudson Vineyards’ premium grapes are sold to 27 wineries in Napa and Sonoma counties, some of which produce wines from specific vineyard sites identified as distinct and bear the ‘Hudson Vineyards’ designation on their labels.

product_name: Bodegas Toro Albalá Don PX Pedro Ximenez 2002
product_description: Grape varietal and region: 100% Pedro Ximénez. Bodegas Toro Albalá creates wines with 30% of grapes from their own vineyards and 70% coming from partner growers in Montilla-Moriles.

product_name: Bodegas Toro Albalá Fino Eléctrico En Rama NV
product_description: The fino Eléctrico is a classic wine that has been taking part in Andalusian people’s lives since 1922. Toro Albalá’s foundational winery is settled in the zone’s first power plant, which gave birth to jokes between the natives that said that the wine had electricity or that it was electric. The famous name of the fino “Eléctrico” originates from that story, as well as the original lightbulb bottle design.

Located at the foot of the hill south of the medieval village of Saint-Emilion, the terroir of Château Canon La Gaffelière is composed of clay-limestone and clay-sandy soils, very filtering, particularly receptive to heat.

Located at the foot of the hill south of the medieval village of Saint-Emilion, the terroir of Château Canon La Gaffelière is composed of clay-limestone and clay-sandy soils, very filtering, particularly receptive to heat.

This is the 'Pink' member of Blankbottle's The Bomb range. A solid 14.5% alcohol Piekenierskloof Grenache noir Rose, please do not judge the wine by it's alcohol... It is on the high side but the wine is in 100% balance. Fresh as a daisy.<br data-mce-fragment="1">
This wine comes out of a request for a red wine to partner the Blankbottle Moment of Silence.

'Koffer' means suitcase in Afrikaans, and this wine is the winemaker's ode to a 'suitcase full of memories' after 12 years of working with the Breedekloof-based farming family from whom he sources the Cinsault grapes.

Grape Varietals & Region: 100% Cinsault. Raised bush vine vineyard on the valley floor of the Breedekloof.

The Rolling Stones inspired label has another meaning on this Malbec from Stellenbosch. If you translate the word “Mal” from Afrikaans to English, it means “crazy” and “Bek” means “mouth”.

Grape Varietals & Region: 100% Malbec. Single vineyard trellis Malbec - Blaauwklippen road - 254m above sea-level NE facing slope.

Aasvoël is an Afrikaans word for a ”vulture”. This wine started off with the winemaker, Pieter Walser, being an “Aasvoël”, not able to buy the grapes on a regular basis from the farmer based in Helderberg, and waiting patiently in line for his share of the grapes.

Grape Varietals & Region: A blend of 51% Cabernet Sauvignon, 25% Merlot, 23% Cabernet Franc, 1% Petit Verdot. The grapes selected for the Anthonij Rupert Optima, comes from the L’Ormarins Estate in Franschhoek and Rooderust farm in Darling.  Specific sites, each with their own unique soil type and climatic conditions, were identified for the ideal grape selection, which makes up unique components of the final blend in Optima.

product_description: J.B. Becker Wallufer Berg Bildstock Kabinett 2016 is a delicious German Riesling from the Rheingau region. This wine is made by J.B. Becker, a small, family-run winery that has been producing wines since the 17th century. The grapes used in this wine are grown on the steep slopes of the Wallufer Berg vineyard, which has a unique terroir of slate soils that impart a distinctive minerality to the wine.

Bodega Matsu sits in a land where the grape gives everything without asking for anything in return. Thanks to very special climatic conditions and a privileged soil that prevents the appearance of pests and diseases, in the DO Toro vineyards nature is always allowed to complete its own cycles. With La Jefa, Matsu shows us the feminine side of a winery that has not stopped captivating people since it started. A pleasant wine with character as well as all the necessary structure to make it last for a long time. No one can resist La Jefa!

product_name: Neethlingshof Estate Short Story Collection Six Flowers 2019
product_description: As a tribute to her children, Maria Marais, resourceful & feisty young widow, personally created & placed six flowers representing her five children & herself in the Manor House's gables. Still relevant today, these six flowers represent the current generation's restoration of Renosterveld vegetation that was common among the vineyards in the 1800s

ethlingshof Estate Pinotage 2020 is a wine that embodies the character and charm of the Stellenbosch region. With its captivating flavors, smooth texture, and a touch of South African terroir, it is a delightful expression of the unique Pinotage grape. Indulge in the allure of this red wine and experience the essence of Neethlingshof Estate in each glass!

Grape Varietal & Region: Neethlingshof Estate Pinotage is made exclusively from the Pinotage grape, a unique South African varietal that is a cross between Pinot Noir and Cinsault. The grapes are sourced from the esteemed Neethlingshof Estate located in Stellenbosch, a region known for its exceptional vineyards and wines.

Taste Profile: This Pinotage offers an enticing combination of ripe fruit and savory flavors. It showcases rich blackberry and plum notes, complemented by hints of cherry, spice, and subtle smoky undertones. The wine has a medium to full body, with well-integrated tannins and a velvety texture. It strikes a harmonious balance between fruitiness, acidity, and oak influences, culminating in a smooth and lingering finish.

Winemaking Process: Neethlingshof Estate Pinotage undergoes careful vineyard management and hand-harvesting to ensure the optimal ripeness and quality of the grapes. After fermentation, the wine is aged in a combination of French and American oak barrels to enhance its complexity and impart subtle nuances. This meticulous winemaking process allows the wine to express the true character of the Pinotage grape and the unique terroir of Stellenbosch.

Neethlingshof Estate has a history that dates back to the 17th century, making it one of the oldest wine estates in South Africa. The winery combines traditional winemaking techniques with modern innovation to produce wines that capture the essence of the Stellenbosch region. With a commitment to sustainable practices and a focus on quality, the winemaker at Neethlingshof Estate strives to showcase the true potential of South African wines.

NE Contino Reserva 2017 is a captivating and sophisticated red wine crafted by the renowned CVNE winery in the Rioja region of Spain. Here's a captivating yet informative summary of this wine:

Grape Varietals & Region: CVNE Contino Reserva is made from a blend of traditional grape varieties, including 86% Tempranillo, 2% Garnacha, 6% Graciano, and 6% Mazuelo. Produced from a variety of micro-vineyards in the area surrounding Viñedos del Contino with distinct soil types (alluvial, clay-limestone, saline and sandy).

Taste Profile: This Reserva exemplifies the elegance and complexity of Rioja wines. It offers a harmonious fusion of ripe red and black fruit flavors, such as cherries, plums, and blackberries, intertwined with hints of spices, vanilla, and subtle oak notes. The wine showcases a smooth and velvety texture, well-integrated tannins, and a long, satisfying finish.

Winemaking Process: CVNE Contino Reserva undergoes meticulous winemaking techniques to ensure its exceptional quality. The grapes are hand-harvested at optimal ripeness and carefully selected. Fermentation in small stainless steel and concrete tanks, followed by further aging in the bottle. This extended aging process allows the wine to develop its complex flavors and aromas while achieving a perfect balance.

CVNE, also known as Compañía Vinícola del Norte de España, is a prestigious winery with a rich history dating back to 1879. The winery has a deep commitment to quality and craftsmanship, and its Contino range represents the pinnacle of their winemaking expertise. With a focus on sustainable practices and an unwavering dedication to tradition, CVNE continues to produce exceptional wines that captivate wine enthusiasts worldwide.

CVNE Vina Real Gran Reserva 2016 is a captivating and exquisite red wine from the renowned CVNE winery in Spain. In the 1920s CVNE launched the Viña Real brand, being one of the pioneers in the production of wines aged in oak barrels in this area, producing very elegant wines with all the character of the Rioja Alavesa.

erila 'Retro' Selection Red 2018 is an intriguing red wine that showcases the richness and depth of the Vipava Valley, Slovenia. 

Grape Varietals & Region: Guerila 'Retro' Selection Red is a blend of Merlot, Cabernet France & Barbera sourced from vineyards in the Vipava Valley, Slovenia. These vines lie at an altitude of 250 to 450 metres above sea level on soil composed of sand, sandstone, marl, limestone and clay

Taste Profile: This red wine offers a captivating taste profile that combines richness and elegance. Guerila Retro Selection Red 2018 is a concentrated red wine with aromas of ripe black fruits, spicy notes and hints of graphite. On the palate it is rich, complex and elegant. A full-bodied wine with silky tannins, pleasant freshness and an exceptionally long aftertaste.

Winemaking Process: Guerila 'Retro' Selection Red is crafted with meticulous attention to detail. Zmago Petric's idea of viticulture is based on a great respect for nature and using organic practices and compost and biodynamic preparations to increase the natural resistance of the plants. All varieties are harvested by hand at the same time. In the winery, the pressed grapes macerate for 4 weeks and ferment spontaneously with native yeasts. The wine then ages in foudres for 24 months. Finally, it is bottled following the biodynamic calendar adding minimal sulpur and without filtration.

The winemakers at Guerila are dedicated to expressing the unique terroir of the Vipava Valley in their wines. They strive to cultivate the vines using sustainable practices and work with a minimal intervention approach in the cellar, allowing the grapes to shine through. Their passion for winemaking is evident in the exceptional quality and character of their wines.

Guerila 'Retro' Selection White 2019 is a captivating white wine that showcases the quality and unique character of the vineyards in the Vipava Valley, Slovenia. Fresh, biodynamic & incredibly fragrant

Grape Varietals & Region: Guerila 'Retro' Selection White is a blend of different grape varietals sourced from vineyards in the Vipava Valley, Slovenia. An orange wine made from the native Zelen, Pinella, Rebula and Malvasía varieties cultivated in the Vipava Valley on soil composed of sand, sandstone, marl, limestone and clay.

Bollina Narses Campania Aglianico 2021 is a captivating red wine that showcases the unique character of the Aglianico grape from the Campania region. Campagna's premier wine estate and winner of a dozen Tre Bicchieri awards, the wines from Bollina are some of the best in Italy. Andrea Bernardini burst onto the scene in 2007, and this impressive Italian estate is creating innovative, fun, amazing value wines.

Kamara Nimbus Ritinitis 2020 is an intriguing red wine that showcases the rich and expressive character of the Assyrtiko grape variety in an macerated style, born out of a century old winemaking recipe from the family's great grandfather, who was a winemaker in present day Bulgaria. Its name means orange cloud

Kamara Nimbus Albus 2020 is a captivating and unique white wine that showcases the distinctive qualities of the Malagousia & Assyrtiko. The Nimbus series is their natural non filtered series, and it's hazy yet soft & round tells us their interpretation of what drinking a cloud would taste like.
Kamara Pet Nat Blooming Mountain 2021 is a delightful sparkling wine that showcases the vibrant and effervescent nature of the Petillant Naturel winemaking method

nmai Ginjo-shu is a sake that is made with Gouriki (強力) rice, a valuable variety of rice that was once on the brink of extinction. Gouriki (強力) is a rice breed that was mainly cultivated in Tottori Prefecture, but it almost vanished because of the difficulty in growing it. Nevertheless, the Gouriki (強力) rice breed was revived using only five seeds through significant efforts in organic cultivation.

Gourikimai (強力米), the mystic breed of rice that was cultivated in prewar japan
Gouriki (強力) rice was dubbed mystic rice because cultivation proved problematic in postwar japan. Fortunately, it was successfully resurrected from near extinction in Tottori prefecture. The mayor of Awano town (粟野町), a town located northwest to Oyama city and now part of Kanuma city (鹿沼市), learned of the existence of Gourikimai while performing a Shinto rite of Gouhanshiki (強飯式) in the Hokkouji area (発光路地区). He visited Tottori prefecture, the source of gouriki rice, acquired five gouriki rice seeds and began cultivating Gourikimai. Neither Awano town nor Kanuma city have a brewing company
This product is a sake-based yuzu-flavored liqueur, using fragrant yuzu (an aromatic citron) produced inKaminoho Village, Gifu Prefecture. Enjoy the rich taste and refreshing bouquet of yuzu.

Chalari Wines Vermentino Chenin Blend 2021 is a captivating and harmonious wine that combines the best of two distinct grape varietals, Vermentino and Chenin Blanc. This unique blend showcases the winemaker's artistry and the exceptional terroir of the vineyard, resulting in a wine that is vibrant, aromatic, and full of character.

product_name: Swan Valley Wines Forest Blanc Sauvignon Blanc Semillon 2021
product_description: Swan Valley Wines Forest Blanc Sauvignon Blanc Semillon 2021 is a captivating wine that showcases the beauty and elegance of the Swan Valley wine region in Western Australia. This blend of Sauvignon Blanc and Semillon grapes perfectly captures the essence of the region's terroir, resulting in a wine that is both vibrant and refreshing.

product_name: Jose Gil Vinedos en San Vicente de la Sonsierra 2021
product_description: Jose Gil Vinedos en San Vicente de la Sonsierra 2021 is a captivating wine that showcases the unique terroir of San Vicente de la Sonsierra, a renowned wine region in Spain. This wine is a testament to the passion and dedication of winemaker Jose Gil, who strives to produce wines of exceptional quality and character.

Dappersveld Bruut Brut Sparkling 2020 is a lively and charismatic sparkling wine that embodies the spirit of celebration. Crafted with meticulous care and attention, this wine offers a captivating blend of elegance, effervescence, and sheer delight.

Spier Good Natured Chenin Blanc 2022 is a delightful and refreshing wine that embodies the vibrant spirit of South African winemaking. Crafted from the iconic Chenin Blanc grape, this wine offers a captivating blend of fruity aromas, crisp flavors, and a touch of natural goodness.

Pasaeli Wild Ferment Calkarasi 2021 is a captivating and unique wine that showcases the indigenous Calkarasi grape from Turkey's Thrace region. With its wild fermentation and expressive nature, it offers an exciting journey for wine enthusiasts looking for something distinctive and adventurous.

product_name: Quinta do Ermízio Glug Glug Vinho Verde 2021
product_description: Glug Glug Vinho Verde 2021 is a refreshing and vibrant wine that captures the essence of Portugal's famous Vinho Verde region. With its crisp acidity and lively character, it is the perfect companion for warm summer days or any occasion that calls for a light and invigorating wine.

Coravin Timeless Needles are specially designed to pierce through natural or agglomerated cork, or the Coravin Timeless Screw Cap, and allow you to pour wine without opening the bottle. The Coravin Timeless Three Needle Kit contains three distinct Needles to suit any bottle or situation: Timeless Fast Pour Needle, Timeless Vintage Needle, and Timeless Standard Needle.

Radford Dale Frankenstein Pinotage 2020 is an intriguing and captivating wine that defies expectations and challenges the conventions of traditional Pinotage. Crafted with passion and creativity, this wine showcases the best of South Africa's winemaking prowess and highlights the unique characteristics of the Pinotage grape.

Radford Dale Freedom Pinot Noir 2017 is a captivating and expressive wine that showcases the beauty of South African terroir and the finesse of Pinot Noir. This wine is crafted with meticulous care and attention to detail, resulting in a truly exceptional and memorable drinking experience.

Bright straw colour with green reflections. Nose of orange fruit such as citrus orange and apricot are complemented by fresh peach, white nectarine and subtly sweet tropical fruit of mango and soursop. Casa Rojo The Orange Republic is an explosion of mouth-watering flavours of briny grapefruit, lemon zest, more apricots, quince and papaya. Silky mouthfeel and balanced acidity. The full-bodied palate is rich and well-balanced with a salinity that'll have you craving that next sip. Fresh and prolonged finish. Subtle sweet tropical memories.

Ferro 13 Primitivo "Karma" IGT 2021 is a captivating wine that embodies the spirit of the Primitivo grape variety in a truly harmonious way. This Italian red wine hails from the Salento region of Puglia, known for producing exceptional Primitivo wines.

product_name: Catherine Marshall Fine Art Collection Grenache Noir 2022
product_description: Catherine Marshall Fine Art Collection Grenache Noir 2022 is a captivating wine that showcases the artistry and expertise of renowned winemaker Catherine Marshall. This wine is a true masterpiece, crafted from the finest Grenache Noir grapes sourced from exceptional vineyards in the Western Cape region of South Africa.

Catherine Marshall Peter's Vision 2017 is a captivating wine that embodies the vision and passion of esteemed winemaker Catherine Marshall. This wine is a beautifully crafted blend that showcases the best qualities of the chosen grape varieties and the unique terroir of the Hemel-en-Aarde Valley in South Africa.

product_name: Catherine Marshall Pinot Noir on Sandstone Soils 2019
product_description: Catherine Marshall Pinot Noir on Sandstone Soils 2019 is a captivating wine that reflects the unique influence of sandstone soils on the expression of Pinot Noir. Crafted by the talented winemaker Catherine Marshall, this wine showcases the delicate and nuanced character of the grape, grown in the picturesque Hemel-en-Aarde Valley of South Africa.

product_name: Catherine Marshall Finite Elements Pinot Noir 2017
product_description: Catherine Marshall Finite Elements Pinot Noir 2017 is a captivating expression of South African Pinot Noir, crafted by the talented winemaker Catherine Marshall. This wine showcases the finest elements of the Hemel-en-Aarde Valley region, where cool ocean breezes and diverse soils create an ideal environment for growing exceptional Pinot Noir grapes.

product_name: Willi Schaefer Graacher Domprobst Riesling Spätlese #5 2020
product_description: Willi Schaefer Graacher Domprobst Riesling Spätlese #5 2020 is an exquisite German Riesling that embodies the essence of the Mosel region. Produced by the renowned winemaker Willi Schaefer, this wine showcases the unique terroir and meticulous winemaking techniques that have made the estate famous.

Villa Yustina 4 Seasons Winter 2019 is a captivating red wine that showcases the unique terroir of the Thracian Valley in Bulgaria. Crafted by Villa Yustina winery, this wine captures the essence of the winter season, offering a rich and complex flavor profile that delights the senses.

product_name: Ca dei Frati Pietro Dal Cero Amarone Della Valpolicella DOCG 2016
product_description: Ca dei Frati Pietro Dal Cero Amarone Della Valpolicella DOCG 2016 is a captivating and prestigious red wine hailing from the renowned Valpolicella region in Veneto, Italy. Crafted by Ca dei Frati, this Amarone showcases the winery's commitment to producing wines of exceptional quality and expression.

product_name: Ca dei Frati Rosa dei Frati DOC 2021
product_description: Ca dei Frati Rosa dei Frati DOC 2021 is a captivating rosé wine crafted by Ca dei Frati in the Lombardy region of Northern Italy. This delightful wine showcases the winery's expertise in producing elegant and refreshing rosés that capture the essence of the region.

product_name: Ca dei Frati Brolettino Lugana DOC 2021
product_description: Ca dei Frati Brolettino Lugana DOC 2021 is a captivating white wine crafted from the Turbiana grape variety in the renowned Lugana region of Northern Italy. Known for its expressive and vibrant character, this wine showcases a harmonious balance of fruitiness, minerality, and freshness.

product_name: Soter Vineyards Pinot Noir Planet Oregon 2020
product_description: Soter Vineyards Pinot Noir Planet Oregon 2020 is an elegant and balanced wine made from 100% Pinot Noir grapes sourced from the Willamette Valley in Oregon. This wine offers a beautiful expression of the region with bright red fruit aromas of raspberry and cherry, and a hint of earthiness. On the palate, it is smooth and silky with soft tannins and a bright acidity, leading to a long and refreshing finish.

Susana Esteban Cabriolet Touriga Nacional 2018 is an elegant red wine from the Alentejo region of Portugal. It is made exclusively from Touriga Nacional, a grape known for producing bold and full-bodied wines with intense aromas and flavors. The grapes are handpicked from a single vineyard, then carefully selected and fermented in stainless steel tanks to preserve their purity and intensity.

Quinta do Vallado Sousao 2019 is a red wine made exclusively from the Sousao grape variety grown in the Douro Valley region of Portugal. The grapes were carefully handpicked and underwent temperature-controlled fermentation in stainless steel tanks, followed by aging in oak barrels for 12 months.

Quinta do Vallado Touriga Nacional 2019 is a bold and complex red wine that showcases the Touriga Nacional grape, a signature varietal of Portugal's Douro Valley. Grown on the estate's own vineyards, the grapes are carefully selected and hand-harvested, then aged in French oak barrels for 16 months.

Burja Stranice 2018 is a white wine made from 100% Rebula (Ribolla Gialla) grape variety grown in the Vipava Valley of Slovenia. The winemakers at Burja Estate use biodynamic and sustainable viticulture practices to create a unique expression of the Rebula grape.

Antica Formula is a red vermouth made in Italy. It is a classic and historic vermouth that has been produced since 1786. The recipe for Antica Formula is based on a blend of over 30 different herbs and spices, including vanilla, saffron, and wormwood. The vermouth is aged for over a year in oak casks, which imparts a rich and complex flavor to the finished product.

400 Conejos Mezcal Joven is a traditional mezcal made from 100% agave Espadín grown in Oaxaca, Mexico. The agave hearts are cooked in an underground pit oven, then crushed by a horse-drawn tahona, and naturally fermented with wild yeast. After fermentation, it is double-distilled in copper stills, resulting in a smooth and flavorful spirit.

product_name: Gin Liquer June by G'Vine Floraison
product_description: June by G'Vine Floraison is a unique and innovative gin liqueur that combines the flavors of wild peach, summer fruits, and a bouquet of fresh flowers. It is made with the grape-based G'Vine Floraison gin as its base and infused with natural botanicals and vine flowers, resulting in a light, floral and fruity flavor profile that is perfect for summer cocktails.

product_name: Gin Liquer June by G'Vine Peach
product_description: June by G'Vine Peach is a premium gin liqueur that combines the smoothness of G'Vine gin with the sweetness of succulent and ripe peach flavors. Produced in France, this delicious gin liqueur is created using a blend of natural peach flavors and other botanicals, and is made using a slow maceration process to ensure that the flavors are perfectly infused.

Donnafugata Vino Spumante Bianco 2018 is a sparkling white wine from Sicily, Italy. It is made from a blend of indigenous grapes, including Ansonica and Catarratto, that are grown in the Contessa Entellina estate. The wine is made using the Champenoise method, which involves a secondary fermentation in bottle to create the bubbles.

Perfectly portable, these cans are easy to carry and ideal for outdoor adventures. Enjoy a delicious glass of wine anywhere, anytime. Whether you're lounging at the beach, hiking through nature or simply picnicking in the park, our canned wines provide you with the convenience you need to make the most of your day. And when you're done, simply recycle the can for a sustainable twist on your drinking experience
Rockford Sparkling Black Shiraz is a unique and vibrant wine produced in Barossa Valley, Australia. It is made using the Shiraz grape, which is traditionally used to make full-bodied red wines.

product_name: Wolf & Woman Wines Old Vine Pinotage 2022
product_description: Wolf & Woman Old Vine Pinotage is a rich and complex wine made from grapes sourced from old vines in the Swartland region of South Africa. The vines are grown in decomposed granite soils, and the warm, dry climate of the region allows the grapes to fully ripen while maintaining their acidity.

product_name: Wolf & Woman Wines Old Vine Grenache Blanc 2022
product_description: Wolf & Woman Grenache Blanc 2022 is a South African wine made from 100% Grenache Blanc grapes, harvested from a single vineyard in the Voor-Paardeberg region. The vineyard is known for its granitic soils and the influence of the South Westerly wind, which cools down the grapes at night and slows down their ripening process, leading to better acidity. The grapes were hand-picked in the morning, chilled for 24 hours, and then whole bunch pressed before undergoing natural fermentation in 500L old oak barrels. The wine was left to mature on the lees for 10 months before bottling.

product_name: Vinos del Viento Montecito Garnacha Campo de Borja DO 2018
product_description: Vinos del Viento Montecito Garnacha Campo de Borja DO 2018 is a Spanish red wine made from 100% Garnacha grapes grown in the Campo de Borja DO region of Spain. On the nose, it exhibits aromas of red fruit, such as raspberry and cherry, with hints of spice and vanilla. On the palate, it is a medium-bodied wine with a smooth texture and flavors of ripe red fruits, black pepper, and a touch of oak.

Cascina Chicco Langhe Nebbiolo DOCG 2020 is a red wine from the Piedmont region of Italy. It is made from the Nebbiolo grape variety and has a taste profile that includes red fruit, floral notes, and hints of spice. The wine is aged for 10 months in large oak barrels to develop a full-bodied and complex flavor.

Cascina Chicco Roero Montespinato DOCG 2018 is a red wine made from 100% Nebbiolo grapes, grown in the Roero region of Piedmont, Italy. The wine offers an intense aroma of dark berries, cherries, and spices, with a subtle hint of tobacco. On the palate, it is well-balanced, with firm tannins and a long finish.

Cascina Chicco Birbet NV is a sweet and sparkling wine produced in the Piedmont region of Italy. It is made using the Brachetto grape variety, which is known for its fragrant and fruity characteristics. This wine is light pink in color and has aromas of ripe red berries, rose petals, and a hint of spice. On the palate, it is fresh and slightly sweet, with flavors of strawberries, raspberries, and a touch of citrus.

product_name: Cascina Chicco Roero Arneis Anterisio DOCG 2020
product_description: Cascina Chicco Roero Arneis Anterisio DOCG 2020 is a white wine made from 100% Arneis grapes grown in the Roero region of Piedmont, Italy. The wine has a straw yellow color with greenish reflections and a complex and intense bouquet of white flowers, apple, and pear. On the palate, it is dry, fresh, and fruity with a long, mineral finish.

product_name: Cascina Chicco Metodo Classico Extra Brut Cuvee Zero 2019
product_description: 100% Nebbiolo, from the Roero region in Piedmont, Italy.

Partida Creus VY 2020 is a natural white wine from Catalonia, Spain. This wine is made from a blend of two indigenous grape varieties, Macabeu and Xarel·lo, sourced from organic vineyards located in the Baix Penedès region.

ABK6 Cognac VSOP is a premium spirit made from a blend of eaux-de-vie from the Grande Champagne and Petite Champagne regions of Cognac, France. It is aged for at least 5 years in Limousin oak barrels, resulting in a rich and complex flavor profile.

product_name: Baron Gaston Legrand Bas Armagnac Vintage 1994
product_description: Baron Gaston Legrand Bas Armagnac 1994 is a high-quality French brandy made in the Bas Armagnac region. The brandy is made from a blend of Ugni Blanc and Colombard grapes and has a rich and complex taste profile. On the nose, it exudes notes of dried fruits, vanilla, and oak, while the palate is greeted with flavors of caramel, toffee, and spices, with a long and satisfying finish.

product_name: Baron Gaston Legrand Bas Armagnac Vintage 1983
product_description: Baron Gaston Legrand Bas Armagnac 1983 is a vintage Armagnac made in the Bas Armagnac region of southwestern France. This Armagnac is made exclusively from the Folle Blanche grape variety, which is known for its delicate and floral character.

product_name: Baron Gaston Legrand Bas Armagnac Vintage 1980
product_description: Baron Gaston Legrand Bas Armagnac 1980 is a premium French brandy made from a blend of Ugni Blanc, Colombard and Folle Blanche grapes grown in the Armagnac region of Gascony. This spirit has a complex and rich taste profile with notes of vanilla, caramel, dried fruit, and spice.

Cantina Giardino Sophia Greco IGP 2021 is a white wine made from the Greco grape varietal grown in Campania, Italy. A pale hazy amber, its pure citrus fruit is gently spiced with neat tannins and a long mineral finish adding plenty of intrigue

product_name: Cantina Giardino Tara ra Greco IGP 2021
product_description: Cantina Giardino Tara ra Greco IGP 2021 is an exciting white wine produced by Cantina Giardino, a renowned winery located in Campania, Italy.

product_name: Cantina Giardino Paski Coda di Volpe IGP 2021
product_description: Cantina Giardino Paski Coda di Volpe IGP 2021 is a white wine made from the Coda di Volpe grape variety in the IGP area of Paestum, Campania, Italy.

Il Gusto della Costa Limoncello is a classic Italian liqueur made from the zest of the finest quality lemons from the Amalfi Coast. The lemons are carefully peeled by hand, and the zest is steeped in a high-quality grain alcohol for several weeks. After the maceration process is complete, the lemon-infused alcohol is mixed with sugar and water to create a sweet, tangy, and refreshing liqueur with a bright yellow color.

product_name: La Perdida Malas Uvas White Vadeorras Galicia 2021
product_description: La Perdida Malas Uvas White Vadeorras Galicia 2021 is a unique blend of 80% Palomino and 20% Doña Blanca grapes grown in the rugged and mountainous Vadeorras region of Galicia, Spain. This wine is characterized by its fresh and lively taste profile, with notes of citrus, green apple, and a touch of minerality.

product_name: La Perdida O Pando Godello White Vadeorras Galicia 2021
product_description:

Gentle Folk Rainbow Juice 2021 is a vibrant and lively natural wine hailing from the Adelaide Hills region of Australia. Made by Gareth Belton, this wine is a blend of Chardonnay, Sauvignon Blanc, Gewürztraminer, and Pinot Gris grapes, all grown using organic and biodynamic farming practices.

MURI YAMILÉ

What started with a visit to MURI's brewery ended in a friendship and collaboration with the Restaurant Kadeau team to create a special aperitif. Over a series of meetings they developed a blend with aromatic pine aromas, heady floral notes and a rich buttery mouthfeel. A blend of red gooseberry wine washed in rose butter, Kadeau’s pickled pine cones, flowering currant, and smoked blackberry leaf kefir. Named after the beautiful forest in Bornholm where Kadeau collect the cones, they call it Paradisbakkerne

MURI YAMILÉ is an aromatic, funky and smoky sparkling rosé. Soft red fruits and creamy smokiness with a delicate aromatic finish. Yamilé is refreshingly dry and approachable but with playful flavour complexities and vinous funkiness.

MURI PASSING CLOUDS is a dry, complex and floral champagne alternative. Sparkling and refreshing with bright acidity and a heady nose of flowers, honey and ripe fruits. Passing Clouds is dry but with multiple dimensions of flavours and a vinous funkiness.

eta charset="utf-8">

MURI NUALA

MURI NUALA is a fruity, light and tannic red wine alternative. Complex, juicy and fresh but with real poise. Aromas of red berries are met with a hint of forest, a slight tartness and a layered palate with gentle tannins.
60% rye wort, 30% The Fruit Pet-Nat Formerly Known As Cider, and 10% rondo grapes

Gul is Gron's straightforward chuggable cousin. No amphoras or barrels; just straight up juicy pears and saison beer. Like Grön, Gul is 60% saison wort and 40% pears (Conference & Alexander Lukas), that have been partially macerated to add some of the delicious pear skin flavour to the beer. Due to the pears, this hybrid cider & beer contains some residual sugar, which gives balance and contrast to the funky sourness of the spontaneous fermentation.

Rich, deep and acidic, Grön is a wild fruit beer hybrid that combines a wheat saison with fermented apple juice. While containing the zingy frukstereo acidity, Grön is a new take on wild beers that is part beer, part cider and part wine, but very much its own entity. Grön is brewed with 60% saison wort and 40% aromatic late harvest apples (Cox, Gloster & Belle de Boskoop), that have been partially skin-macerated and stored in wine amphoras. The saison has been brewed with a small amount of mosiac hops, adding depth and contrast to the fruitiness of the beer.

The origin of the fruit is Axelstorp – a traditional orchard in northwest Skåne. Planted in the 40s/60s and today managed without pesticides or herbicides by Magnus “Fäviken” Nilsson. Quince from Martins garden in southern parts of Malmö, one single tree planted 15 years ago. The fruit were partly skin macerated for 4 weeks. An aromatic and funky beverage that reminds us of more classic and oxidised ciders from the basque country with a tart and tangy finish perfect for pairing with grilled dishes like fish or vegetables.

Is this even cider anymore? We are not sure. That is why we named this cuvee Maybe?, as we believe it challenges the boundaries between cider and wine. All fruits were co-fermented for around 1 month. The result is a creamy, easy drinkable sparkling fruit wine, where the co- fermented fruits bring out the best in each other. The grape skins add structure and body, and the apples and pears adds fruitiness, giving the wine heavy tropical yellow fruit notes, such as melon, mango and papaya.

product_name: Fruktstereo The Fruit Pet-Nat Formerly Known As Cider 2020
product_description: Our fruit petnat that is predominantly based on macerations with red fruits. Despite mainly consisting of apples, the goal with this cuvee is to use apples as a base for macerations, to extract as much flavor from the berries, plums and grapes. We also added pears, to include a bit of residual sugar, for balancing out the cuvee. The result is a big velvety and fruity cuvee with notes of dark berries, and energetic acidity.

Plumenian Rhapsody is where co-fermentation started for us at FRUKTSTEREO. With this cuvee we mix apples, plums and red grapes to push the boundaries within cider and fruit wines and create something new. This sparkling fruit wine is a season-long fermentation project. It starts with early plums and apple varieties in August, that we continuously top up and re-ferment several times with new fruits during the harvest season, until bottling in November. We only use the best available produce in peak maturity so every vintage changes a lot depending on taste and coincidences.

Our first Swedish rendition of our year-long collaboration with our dear friend and beyond talented winemaker, Come Isambert. The Tour de Fruit project started back in 2017 where we went foraging in the Loire valley with Come for wild pears, apples and blended it with wine from his cellar. Since then it has been an annual collab project, but due to the pandemic we had to do a Swed- ish only version for 2020. We wanted to pay homage to Come so we kept the name, but changed it from fruit to frukt to make it more swedish.

After pressing the Cox and Gloster apples, we did a 3 week long skin maceration during fermentation. While still fermenting, we seperate the juice from the pulp, and press it once more to extract as much tannins, complexity and structure into the cider as possible. We divided the juice into different batches, and fermented most of the juice in our in-house amphora: a fermentation vessel made of clay, that has been used for traditional Georgian wine making for thousands of years. It is a rich and big cuvee, which is almost more reminiscent of an orange wine, rather than a cider.

The Cuvee is made with different batches of pear and apple ferments from 2019 and 2020. The different fermentations include co-fermented pear and apple cuvees, directly pressed pear juice, and batches that have undergone skin maceration. Some of the batches have been stored under flor, meaning that during fermentation, the juice protects itself from oxygen with a thin layer of yeast. The mix of different vintages makes MVP taste fresh and energetic, but also complex and big.

Cider revolution gets its taste from 3 weeks of skin maceration with the leftover pulp from the press. While fermenting some of the batches develop flor, that brings a bit of oxidative notes and saltiness. We ferment the pears and apples separately, and blend just before bottling the cuvee.

This pear based ultra funky and electric cuvee consists of pears gathered from all our local growers and producers, that we ferment together, in glass fiber tanks. After the fermentation, we store it for a while, before blending in 20% direct pressed Aroma apples, to balance out the pears sweetness and funky aroma. We also do this to get enough sugar for the bottle fermentation. This makes the cuvee very fruity and easy to drink.

Beluga Noble is a premium vodka produced in Russia using traditional methods and high-quality ingredients. The spirit is made from a blend of water from artesian wells and malted grain, which is distilled multiple times for purity and smoothness. Beluga Noble is then filtered through a triple system of birch charcoal, silver, and quartz sand for further refinement. The resulting vodka is rich and full-bodied, with subtle notes of honey and vanilla. It is best enjoyed chilled and makes a great addition to cocktails or as a sipping vodka.

Chase Rhubarb & Bramley Apple Gin is a unique and delicious gin made by the Chase Distillery in Herefordshire, England. It is made using a blend of fresh rhubarb and Bramley apple juice, which are both sourced from local farmers. This gin has a subtle, yet complex flavor profile, with the tartness of the rhubarb complemented by the sweetness of the apple. It is perfect for sipping neat, over ice, or as a base for a refreshing cocktail.
Region: Bottega Gin Bacûr is a premium Italian gin made by Bottega S.p.A., a family-owned distillery located in the Veneto region of Italy.

WILD FERMENTED DANISH CIDER & BEER HYBRID
Organic Danish Cider with Raspberry
Wild Fermented Organic Danish Cider

Wild Fermented Danish Cider & Beer Hybrid.
The apples for this cider here are picked with a used fruit picker or was it cider with used red peaches? Who cares, Ehren! Sprouted from Baghaven, notes of peach & strawberry pop up with recycled satisfaction. Enjoy chilled. Natural sediments may occur.
Prendila Cosi is a fruit pet nat, our wine/grape-focused cider variant. The 2019 vintage is a blend of organic Rod Aroma and Holsteiner Cox apples, with macerations of Danish Rondo and Regent grapes.
Æblerov Benene På Nakken is a wild fermented organic Danish cider. It's called a 'wild cider' since it tastes gorgeous as it is with nothing more added to it.
Æblerov VSN is a wild fermented Danish cider, wine and beer hybrid. This is the taste of Orange.
Æblerov Rainbow Child is a wild fermented organic Danish cider, wine and beer hybrid. It's the taste of pure chance, fruitful disobedience and wild rebellion that gets wilder and wilder.

Special 50/50 blend of our sour base beer and cider made from garden apples from Fyn aged on Spanish apricots. Collab with the guys from Decideret in Nordhavn Copenhagen. 

Half sour beer, half wild cider from Aroma apples - with 8 months of maceration on fresh golden apricots. We have before worked with hops in cider - but never integrated a sour beer base into one of our bottles. High on acid with a lot of apricot on the pallet it takes you into a world of mouth watering fruity lambic and sour winegums but with that dry, vinous finish from the apple ferment. Quite crushable!

18 months sur lie. A bit serious with tannins, toast and yeast. But also fruit, body and aromatic sweetness. Field blend made from a mix of cider varieties and Bramley from Vigmosegaard at Lille.

Serve to bisque or coq au cidre.

Decideret For Your Ice Only 2018

A barrel-aged ice-cider made from French cider varieties cultivated at Claus Meyer's orchard on the island of Lilleø.

Wild and juicy cider pét-nat with an intense tangy expression of bergamot and pineapple that finishes with notes of bitter licorice.

This fruity cider pét-nat is made from organic Rod Topaz (53 %) and Rod Aroma (47 %) from the orchards Lystgarden and Adalen on Fyn. Rod Aroma bursts with juicy fruit and grass on the nose. Topaz was fermented with skin-contact for three weeks adding fresh acidity, light bitterness and depth. Drinks well young as an aperitif or under a parasol, or with white meats.

eta charset="utf-8">

Decideret Hva Drikker Mølr 2021

Wild and juicy cider pét-nat with an intense tangy expression of bergamot and pineapple that finishes with notes of bitter licorice.

This fruity cider pét-nat is made from organic Rød Topaz (50 %) and Rød Aroma (50 %) from the orchards Lystgården and Ådalen on Fyn. Rød Aroma bursts with juicy fruit and grass on the nose. Topaz was fermented with skin-contact for two weeks adding fresh acidity, light bitterness and depth. Drinks well with white meats and vegetabel dishes.

Decideret Plumbastisk 2020+2021 is made from a mix of garden apples & Wild Opal Plums, this is a great match for shellfish! It has an almond nose, fresh sparkling apple acidity and aromatic sweetness from the plums. Made from surplus garden apples from Fyn with a maceration on Opal plums.

6.5% | 750 ml
Decideret Overdrevet 2021 drinks like a light red wine. This purple coloured liquid exudes spices on the nose. Juicy on the palate with a bright acidity and black pepper accents.

Decideret Who the Fuck Pears 2021 is a collaboration between Decideret and Vigmosegaard. The nose smells of pure pears and on the palate it has the perfect balance between sweetness (from Williams pears) and freshness (from Doyenne pears).

Decideret Gewürztraminer 2021 is a collaboration between Decideret, Du vin aux Liens and Sons of Wine. The nose opens with lots of tropical fruit and spice aromas. There's a bit of tannins on the palate that is balanced out by its quenchy acidity from the apples.

eta charset="utf-8">Decideret Spontan 2020 + 2021 is a highly energetic Brut Nature Rosé. Drink it like a sparkling Northern Syrah. Smells like Ribena on the nose but with high acidity.

Made with garden apples from Fyn and blackcurrants from Jutland. Decideret tackles food waste by making additive-free, naturally-fermented ciders from the apples that fall in back gardens across Denmark in autumn and are usually ignored.

Crystallum Wines The Agenes Chardonnay 2020 is a captivating white wine from South Africa's Hemel-en-Aarde Valley, known for producing exceptional cool-climate Chardonnay. This wine showcases the winery's commitment to crafting elegant, expressive, and terroir-driven wines. With a brilliant golden color, it exudes aromas of ripe citrus, apple, and pear, complemented by subtle notes of vanilla and oak. On the palate, it offers a harmonious balance of fruit, acidity, and oak, with a creamy texture and a long, refreshing finish. Crystallum Wines The Agenes Chardonnay 2020 is a wine that epitomizes the artistry of Chardonnay winemaking, capturing the essence of the vineyard and the skill of the winemaker in every sip

Comte de Malartic Rouge 2018 is a distinguished red wine from the esteemed Pessac-Léognan appellation in Bordeaux, France. This wine is a blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, and Petit Verdot, carefully crafted to showcase the unique terroir of the region. It offers a deep garnet color with complex aromas of black fruits, cedar, and tobacco, accompanied by hints of vanilla and spice. On the palate, it is rich, full-bodied, and well-structured, with velvety tannins and a long, lingering finish. Comte de Malartic Rouge 2018 is a wine of elegance, finesse, and exceptional quality, representing the art of winemaking at its finest.

Domaine du Gringet Eponyme (Mise Tardive) 2020 is a unique and remarkable wine hailing from the Savoie region in France. Made from the rare Gringet grape variety, this wine is a true expression of the terroir and the winemaker's craftsmanship. The late harvest brings concentrated flavors of orchard fruits, floral notes, and a touch of minerality. Its full-bodied and luscious palate is balanced by refreshing acidity, making it a standout wine for special occasions or for those seeking something truly extraordinary.

product_name: Domaine Bernard Moreau Chassagne-Montrachet Vieilles Vignes Rouge 2020
product_description: Grape Varietals & Region: Bernard Moreau Chassagne-Montrachet VV Rouge is a red wine that captures the essence of the renowned Chassagne-Montrachet appellation in Burgundy, France. With its expressive and complex flavors, this wine is a true reflection of the terroir, showcasing the unique characteristics of the region.

David Duband Savigny-les-Beaune 1er Aux Gravains 2020 is a captivating and refined Burgundy wine that showcases the distinctive terroir of the renowned Savigny-les-Beaune appellation in France. Produced by the esteemed winemaker David Duband, known for his meticulous approach to winemaking and commitment to quality, this Premier Cru wine is a true gem in the world of Burgundy wines.

product_name: Tenuta Il Canovino Olive Oil Extra Virgin
product_description: A small batch extra virgin olive oil from Tenuta Il Canovino, they are cold-pressed using traditional methods, which help to retain the natural goodness and exquisite taste of the olives.

arward Ginger Beer Cask is back, our most popular and sought after Starward Project to date. Now in its sixth release, this delicious single malt whisky is more expressive than ever and the team’s most experimental to date. The ginger beer recipe is a closely guarded secret by the distillery production team but includes huge amounts of ginger, lemongrass and citrus peel. The ginger beer was brewed in-house and aged in EX Starward whisky barrels for 6 months before being disgorged. Our red wine and Apera casks were blended together before being finished in the ginger beer casks for over a further 6 months and bottled. Loaded with citrus peel and spicy ginger, it’s a zesty little number with aromas of dark chocolate and orange, with a palate of fiery ginger, fresh vanilla, and pineapple.

Nose: Ginger, orange and dark chocolate.

Palate: Strong spicy ginger, fresh vanilla and pineapple, balanced by sweet raisins and fig.

Finish: A big, warming mouthfeel with candied ginger and citrus.

Captivating fragrances of raisin, dried orange, fig leaves and toasted oak drift through. A swirling of nutmeg, brown sugar and a rich dried fruit sweetness on the palate. Cosy spices deliver a slow and lingering finish. A rival to Nan’s fruit cake? Irresistibly so!

Starward Whisky has fused the new world Australian way with old world Scottish expertise to craft UNEXPEATED, a new red wine barrel aged Australian single malt whisky, finished in peated whisky-drenched barrels from the finest distilleries in Islay, Scotland. For the first time, whisky drinkers will taste coastal, peaty, smoky flavour in Starward’s signature fruit-forward whisky. Now that’s UNEXPEATED!

product_name: San Martino Prosecco DOC Treviso Brut
product_description: San Martino Prosecco DOC Treviso Brut is a delightful sparkling wine that hails from the prestigious Prosecco region in Italy's Veneto region. It offers a captivating combination of freshness, elegance, and lively bubbles, making it a perfect choice for any celebration or special occasion.

product_name: San Martino Conegliano Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore DOCG Extra Dry 2021
product_description: San Martino Conegliano Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore DOCG Extra Dry is a captivating sparkling wine that hails from the renowned Valdobbiadene region in Italy's Veneto region. This wine is a true masterpiece, crafted with passion and innovation by Aphros Wines to create a one-of-a-kind wine experience.

product_name: Herdade do Rocim Vale da Mata White 2018
product_description: Herdade do Rocim Vale da Mata White 2018 is a wine that epitomizes the beauty of the Alentejo region in Portugal, showcasing its rich terroir and the skillful winemaking techniques of Herdade do Rocim. This wine is a true expression of the land, crafted with care to deliver a captivating and exquisite wine experience.

The wines born from the partnership between Dolce & Gabbana and Donnafugata focus the attention on details together with the unconditional love for Sicily. The perfect expressions of two excellences of Made in Italy.

product_name: Donnafugata Isolano Dolce Gabbana Etna Bianco 2020
product_description:
solano" is the result of a collaboration between Dolce & Gabbana and Donnafugata, two excellence of Made in Italy united, among other things, by unconditional love for Sicily. It was born in Eastern Sicily, on the north side of Etna; Here the screw is raised with the traditional system of the Etna alberello or a counter -pelliera, on terraces contained by dry stone stone walls. Armored in steel for 9 months, "island" is a white that knows how to stand out; He then contributes to making him peculiar also the same image on the label, conceived by Dolce & Gabbana. The colors of Sicily are enhanced in the graphics and the cunning: the motifs and geometric shapes are typical of the Sicilian cart, in which red, green, blue and yellow dominate. At the center, then, there is the steaming, imposing and lonely Etna.

Straw yellow with golden reflections; The nose stands out of hints of yellow fruits and citrus fruits, followed by notes of Mediterranean herbs. On the palate it is enveloping and of extraordinary minerality.

Perfect in combination with crustaceans, it also goes well with the first vegetarian first courses, fish and white meats

product_name: Herdade do Rocim Fresh From Amphora 2019
product_description: Herdade do Rocim Fresh From Amphora 2019 is a truly unique wine that captures the essence of tradition and innovation in winemaking. Made using ancient winemaking techniques in modern times, this wine is a testament to the artistry and craftsmanship of the winemakers.

product_name: Donnafugata Cuordilava Dolce Gabbana Etna Rosso 2019

This wine is a tribute to the majestic Etna volcano in Sicily, where the grapes are grown in the volcanic soils, resulting in a wine with distinctive character and depth.

product_name: Donnafugata x Dolce Gabbana Rosa Sicilia DOC Rosato 2022
product_description:
Dolce&Gabbana and Donnafugata, extraordinary ambassadors of Sicilian culture. When you desire creativity and craftsmanship.

ROSA is the rosè wine that stands out for its elegant fragrance and minerality; deriving from the partnership between Dolce&Gabbana and Donnafugata, it is the perfect ambassador of two Made in Italy excellences, united by their unconditional love for Sicily, passion for work and attention to detail.

Borachio Summer Nat NV is a delightful and refreshing natural wine that embodies the carefree spirit of summer. Bursting with vibrant flavors and lively acidity, this wine is a true sensory experience that captures the essence of the season.

Vismino Saperavi 2016 is a truly captivating wine that showcases the unique and ancient Saperavi grape variety from the Kakheti region of Georgia. product_name: Clos du Tue Boeuf Qvevri Sauvignon 2020
product_description: Clos du Tue Boeuf Qvevri Sauvignon 2020 is a unique and exciting wine that combines the ancient Georgian Qvevri winemaking technique with the French Sauvignon Blanc grape. The result is a rich and complex wine with notes of apricot, honey, and orange blossom, and a pleasant minerality. The extended skin contact during fermentation in the Qvevri gives the wine a lovely amber color and tannic structure, while the use of wild yeast adds a distinct funkiness.

The wine boasts a deep ruby color and a complex aroma of dark berries, spice, and subtle oak. On the palate, the wine is rich and full-bodied with flavors of black cherry, blackcurrant, and a hint of chocolate. The tannins are firm yet silky, providing a long and satisfying finish.
Bock Cabernet Franc 2018 is a fine example of the grape variety that's become a staple of the Villány region in Hungary.

Vojtek Apainkra Cuvee 2018 is a beautifully crafted Hungarian wine that's a true expression of the terroir it comes from. With an elegant blend of Cabernet Franc, Cabernet Sauvignon, and Merlot grapes, this wine boasts a complex and intense aroma of ripe black fruits, vanilla, and spices. On the palate, it is full-bodied and well-structured, with firm tannins and a long, satisfying finish.

tting garnet in the glass, this wine has layers of depth & complexity. The harmonious combination of purple & dark fruits pair with oak on the nose, followed by smoky spice & rustic, earthy flavours. Candied lemon peel in the mouth over a solid, pure grape juice base. Honeydew & musky plums appear in the finish. Irsai Oliver is a Hungarian crossing between Pozsonyl & Pearl of Csaba that was created in 1930 by Pal Kocsis

product_name: Sella & Mosca Terre Bianche Cuvee 161 Alghero Torbato DOC 2021
product_description: Sella & Mosca Terre Bianche Cuvee 161 Alghero Torbato DOC 2021 is a unique and elegant wine from Sardinia, Italy, made from the indigenous Torbato grape. This wine is a true expression of the Alghero region's terroir, with its coastal influence and calcareous soils. The wine showcases a brilliant straw yellow color with enticing aromas of white flowers, tropical fruits, and a hint of sea breeze. On the palate, it is crisp and fresh, with a mineral-driven character that is both intriguing and refreshing. What sets it apart is its barrel aging, which adds a layer of complexity and richness to the wine, with notes of toasted oak and vanilla adding depth to the vibrant fruit flavors. Sella & Mosca Terre Bianche Cuvee 161 Alghero Torbato DOC 2021 is a truly exceptional wine that offers a captivating experience for wine enthusiasts.

This Chablis 2020 from Domaine Maurice Tremblay is a crisp, mineral-driven white wine with a refreshing acidity that perfectly balances the delicate fruit and floral notes. Made from 100% Chardonnay grapes, this wine is fermented and aged in stainless steel tanks, allowing the purity of the fruit and the terroir to shine through. The nose is fragrant with aromas of white flowers, green apple, and citrus, while the palate is clean and bright with flavors of lemon, pear, and a hint of sea salt. The finish is long and satisfying with a touch of flinty minerality.

product_name: La Del Terreno Ninja De Las Uvas Tinto 2020
product_description: La Del Terreno Ninja De Las Uvas Tinto 2020 is a Spanish red wine made from a blend of Grenache, Carignan, and Tempranillo grapes. This wine is produced by the innovative winemakers of the La Del Terreno winery, who strive to create unique and exceptional wines that reflect the character of the land from which they are grown.

product_name: Catherine Marshall Pinot Noir on Clay Soils 2020
product_description: Catherine Marshall's Pinot Noir on Clay Soils 2020 is a vibrant and elegant wine from the cool climate region of Elgin in South Africa. The grapes are grown on the clay-heavy soils of the vineyard, which impart a unique minerality and depth to the wine. The nose is full of red fruit aromas, including cherries and raspberries, with a hint of smokiness and spice. On the palate, the wine is well-balanced with silky tannins and a long, satisfying finish.

product_name: Lumen Santa Maria Valley Pinot Noir 2018
product_description: Lumen Santa Maria Valley Pinot Noir 2018 is a wine that embodies the unique terroir of the Santa Maria Valley. With a deep ruby color and aromas of dark cherry, raspberry, and spice, this wine offers a complex and nuanced flavor profile that evolves with each sip. On the palate, flavors of red and black fruit, along with hints of clove and vanilla, mingle with a vibrant acidity and smooth tannins, leading to a long and satisfying finish.

This Grenache has a bright ruby color and offers aromas of red fruit, spices, and a hint of vanilla. On the palate, the wine is juicy and medium-bodied, with flavors of ripe cherries, strawberries, and a touch of earthy minerality.

The Shimanouchi Fujimaru Winery, located in Chuo-ku, Osaka, produces a unique Orange wine made from Delaware grapes from Yamagata. This dry, medium-bodied wine has a medium amber colour, with an aroma of guava and pomelo, a sourness of yoghurt, cinnamon, lemon and grapefruit flavour, and a crisp acidity with a gentle bitterness. This wine is produced using wild yeast, has 30 ppm of added sulphites, and is unfiltered. It is recommended to serve at 14-16°C and store in a cool, dark place.

Weingut Esterhazy Beerenauslese 2018 is a dessert wine made from botrytized grapes grown in Burgenland, Austria. product_name: Weingut Esterhazy Estoras Chardonnay Leithaberg DAC 2021
product_description: Weingut Esterhazy's Estoras Chardonnay Leithaberg DAC 2021 is a sophisticated and elegant white wine from Austria's Burgenland region. The wine has a beautiful pale gold color with aromas of citrus, apple, and pear, with hints of vanilla and spice. On the palate, it is rich and creamy with flavors of ripe fruit, lemon zest, and a touch of oak.

Weingut Esterhazy's Estoras Sauvignon Blanc 2021 is a refreshing and vibrant wine that showcases the unique terroir of the Leithaberg region of Austria. The wine is crisp and bright with lively citrus and tropical fruit notes, as well as a mineral undertone that speaks to its origin.

product_name: Weingut Esterhazy Gelber Muskateller No. 17 Amphora 2021
product_description: Weingut Esterhazy Gelber Muskateller No. 17 Amphora 2021 is a unique wine made from the Gelber Muskateller grape variety, which is grown in the Burgenland region of Austria. product_description: Pierre Lamy Coteaux Bourguignons AOC Rouge 2020 is a captivating wine that showcases the rich and diverse terroir of the Burgundy region in France. product_name: Domaine des Deux Roches Macon La Roche Vineuse Blanc Sur Le Fil 2021
product_description: Domaine des Deux Roches Macon La Roche Vineuse Blanc Sur Le Fil 2021 is a captivating and expressive wine that embodies the essence of the Macon La Roche Vineuse appellation in Burgundy, France. This wine is a masterful creation by Domaine des Deux Roches, showcasing meticulous winemaking techniques and a commitment to producing high-quality, terroir-driven wines.

product_name: Domaine Arnaud Baillot Bourgogne Pinot Noir 2020
product_description: Arnaud Baillot Bourgogne Pinot Noir 2020 is a captivating wine that showcases the elegance and complexity of Pinot Noir from the renowned Burgundy region in France. Verdad Albariño Edna Valley 2020 is a captivating wine that showcases the unique characteristics of Albariño grapes grown in the Edna Valley appellation of California. This wine is a true expression of the terroir and winemaking expertise of Verdad Wines.

Stolpman Vineyards Crunchy Roastie 2021 is a captivating and unique wine that pushes the boundaries of winemaking, crafted by the innovative Stolpman Vineyards in California. This wine is an expression of creativity and experimentation, showcasing a bold and exciting approach to winemaking.

product_name: Stolpman So Fresh Grenache Gamay Trousseau 2021
product_description: Stolpman So Fresh Grenache Gamay Trousseau bonds three varietals. Super pure red cherry nose with a bright punch of pomegranate. The aromas follow through to the palate, creating a youthful and tart mouth that has an overarching hint of orange citrus. Trousseau lends a savoury hint of tea leaves, and Gamay adds depth and crunch. Its tannic backbone and juicy acidity creates a structure that makes this wine more serious than just a delicious day-time sip.

Martinelli Zinfandel Vigneto di Evo is a barrel-blend from select Martinelli single vineyard zinfandel sites. A first swirl of the glass introduces you to inviting raspberry, black cherry and white peach aromas. Powerful concentration of ripe red cherry, pepper and liquorice spice flavours on the palate are followed by firm tannins and a lasting pomegranate finish.

Copain Tous Ensemble Pinot Noir 2018 is a beautifully crafted wine made with grapes sourced from several top vineyards in Mendocino County, California. This wine showcases the complexity and elegance of Pinot Noir with a balance of fruit, acidity, and tannins.

product_name: DeLoach Vineyards Russian River Valley Chardonnay 2019
product_description: DeLoach Vineyards Russian River Valley Chardonnay 2019 is a delicious and elegant white wine that showcases the best of the Russian River Valley terroir. It is made using a blend of Chardonnay clones, carefully selected from DeLoach's estate vineyards, which are hand-picked and fermented using native yeasts. The wine is then aged for 10 months in French oak barrels, which add subtle layers of vanilla and toast to the wine's ripe fruit flavors.

Lindquist Viognier-Chardonnay Central Coast 2020 is a delicious and unique blend crafted by the legendary winemaker Bob Lindquist. This wine is a marriage of Viognier and Chardonnay, sourced from a combination of old vine vineyards in the Central Coast region of California.

The Sawyer Lindquist Pinot Noir 2017 is a gorgeous expression of the grape, with complex layers of red fruit, earthy undertones, and a bright acidity that keeps it lively on the palate. The grapes for this wine were sourced from a biodynamic vineyard in the Edna Valley AVA, and the wine was aged in French oak barrels for 18 months.

product_name: Grounded Wine Co. Steady State Cabernet Sauvignon Napa Valley 2019
product_description: Grounded Wine Co. Steady State Cabernet Sauvignon is a delicious and complex wine from Napa Valley. It is made from a blend of grapes grown in three different vineyards, each with their unique terroir. The resulting wine is rich and bold, with aromas of dark fruit, chocolate, and espresso.

Mr Barval Cabernet Merlot 2019 is a delicious red wine blend from Western Australia's Margaret River region. This wine is a collaboration between two well-respected winemakers, Rob Gherardi and Phil Jorgensen. The name "Mr Barval" is derived from their surnames, Gherardi and Jorgensen, and represents their mutual respect and passion for winemaking.

product_name: Fratelli Serio & Battista Borgogno Cannubi Barolo Riserva DOCG 2018
product_description: Fratelli Serio & Battista Borgogno Cannubi Barolo Riserva DOCG 2018 is a stunning expression of one of Italy's most famous wines, made from the Nebbiolo grape variety grown in the legendary Cannubi vineyard in the Piedmont region. This wine is a testament to the skill and passion of the Borgogno family, who have been making wine for over 250 years.

product_name: Commune of Buttons Gloria Pinot Noir 2021
product_description: Commune of Buttons Gloria Pinot Noir 2021 is a wine that embodies the essence of the Adelaide Hills region. With its delicate aromas of red fruits and earthy undertones, this wine is an excellent representation of the cool climate and unique terroir of the area.

The wine has a bright ruby color and exudes aromas of red cherry, raspberry, and black pepper. On the palate, it is juicy and vibrant, with flavors of cranberry, pomegranate, and a hint of cinnamon spice. It is a great wine to enjoy with a light meal or on its own.

Yetti & the Kokonut Metro Savagnin 2021 is a bright and refreshing white wine from the Adelaide Hills region of Australia. It's made from 100% Savagnin, a grape that is typically grown in the Jura region of France, but has found a new home in Australia.
